name: WaapDooBeeDoo
description:
WaapDooBeeDoo is a FPRS (First Person Rhythm Shooter) in which players compite against each other in an arena. It is a free for all deathmatch. But, in WaapDooBeeDoo, movement and shooting is constrained to the beat of the music. Each player has 4 different weapons that shoot at a different beat rate and deal varying damages.

Download for windows for better performance, graphics and no music problems.

2 - 8 players per room

2 people required at least! Find a friend to join you to try it out!

Use WASD, Mouse and 1 - 4 Numbers to change weapon.

Hold the mouse down to shoot.

Made for GGJ15 in Barcelona

http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/waapdoobeedoo

A game by:

@budsan_ @towerthousand @nico_codrilo @fonserbc

Music by:

Publio Delgado
